history.content:
The College of Letters and Science has become much stricter about deadlines for applying for minors, starting in Fall 2020. If you want to minor in something that's in L&S (Math, Stat, Data Science, etc.) or if your major is in L&S, you will need to declare any minors before the end of the semester before you graduate. The minor must appear on your CalCentral page before the last day of the semester, so please give your advisors a couple of weeks to process the paperwork.

So if you plan to graduate in Spring 2021, you will need to declare your minor by a couple of weeks before the end of the Fall 2020 semester.
